title: Ep. - 182 - PRODUCER OF HARD KNOCKS
description:
NFL Films Senior Producer and Director Shannon Furman talks about this season of HBO’s Hard Knocks: Training Camp with the Oakland Raiders, which gives an unfiltered all-access look at what it takes to make it in the National Football League.


Reality Life with Kate Casey 

Patron: http://www.patreon.com/katecasey

Twitter: @katecasey
